TABLE.NAME: findpartner
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the findpartner activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: minmembers
FIELD.COMMENT: Minimum of members that a group can have

FIELD.NAME: maxmembers
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum of members that a group can have

FIELD.NAME: dateclosuregroups
FIELD.COMMENT: Deadline for students to make groups. When the time comes, the groups get automatically fulfill

FIELD.NAME: enddate
FIELD.COMMENT: After this date students won't be able to create or edit workblocks.

FIELD.NAME: autogroupstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: N not done yet, F when the date of closuregroups has come. This is useful for not executing twice the algorithm.

TABLE.NAME: findpartner_projectgroup
TABLE.COMMENT: This is the table of the group.

FIELD.NAME: findpartner
FIELD.COMMENT: findpartner key

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: A short description of the group.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the group

FIELD.NAME: groupadmin
FIELD.COMMENT: The admin of the group (who is an student).

FIELD.NAME: contractstatus
FIELD.COMMENT: 'P' for pending, 'Y' the group has a contract, 'N' the group has not contract

TABLE.NAME: findpartner_student
TABLE.COMMENT: This table contains all the students of the course and his/her group.

FIELD.NAME: studentgroup
FIELD.COMMENT: The student belongs to this group.

FIELD.NAME: studentid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the student.

FIELD.NAME: contactmethodtype
FIELD.COMMENT: The contact method the user selects (email, telegram etc)

FIELD.NAME: contactmethod
FIELD.COMMENT: Contact method, an email, your twitter @ etc

TABLE.NAME: findpartner_request
TABLE.COMMENT: A student send a request to a group to join.

FIELD.NAME: student
FIELD.COMMENT: The student who wants to join the group.

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The group who is asked for the student to get in.

FIELD.NAME: message
FIELD.COMMENT: The message of the request.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of the request: P: pending A: accepted D: denied

TABLE.NAME: findpartner_votes
TABLE.COMMENT: Votes of the group for making contracts

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the group

FIELD.NAME: studentid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the student

FIELD.NAME: vote
FIELD.COMMENT: Y to doing the contract, N to not

TABLE.NAME: findpartner_workblock
TABLE.COMMENT: This is the table for work blocks that will be assigned to the members of the group.

FIELD.NAME: task
FIELD.COMMENT: The task that will be assigned.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The members of the group will vote if they agree with the work block. 'P' for pending votation, 'A' for accepted, 'D' for denied, 'E' for edited, 'C' for complete, 'V' for validated.

FIELD.NAME: datecreation
FIELD.COMMENT: Creation date of the workblock.

FIELD.NAME: datemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Last status modification date.

FIELD.NAME: workblockid
FIELD.COMMENT: The work block that is voted.

FIELD.NAME: studentid
FIELD.COMMENT: The student who votes.

FIELD.NAME: vote
FIELD.COMMENT: 'A' for agree, 'D' for disagree.

TABLE.NAME: findpartner_incharge
TABLE.COMMENT: The member or members who are in charge of a certain block.

FIELD.NAME: workblockid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the block.

FIELD.NAME: studentid
FIELD.COMMENT: The student in charge.

TABLE.NAME: findpartner_complain
TABLE.COMMENT: Complain of a workblock, made by a student

FIELD.NAME: workblockid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the workblock

FIELD.NAME: studentid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the student that makes the complain

FIELD.NAME: datecomplain
FIELD.COMMENT: Creation date of the complain.

TABLE.NAME: findpartner_donevotes
TABLE.COMMENT: Votes to decide if a workblock is done

FIELD.NAME: vote
FIELD.COMMENT: 'A' for agree, 'D' for disagree.

FIELD.NAME: studentid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the student

FIELD.NAME: workblockid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the workblock
